title: Treasuries Rise on Haven Demand as Stocks, Precious Metals Fall
description: Treasuries rose as investors sought refuge from a slide in US equity benchmarks from near record highs and a slump in the price of precious metals.
content: Treasuries rose as investors sought refuge from a slide in US equity benchmarks from near record highs and a slump in the price of precious metals.
